title: Walls and walls
brief_description: A story about walls, literally, symbolically, and psychologically. Contains some animated scenes and footage, stills, historical footage. Experimental film made up of a montage of images, including two dancers in live action. Dancers: Jerry Baden, Wendy Ziegler.
